comment.author: 15537871@N02
comment._content: Yes, it was her apartment on the Upper West Side in Manhattan. She was an interior decorator. The photo accompanied a newspaper article about her, and her work. (They were my great-grandparents; their daughter Kay Swift was my maternal grandmother. For more on Kay Swift, see www.kayswift.com.)
